articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Fish Food Factory under KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Fish Food Factory under KPA Unit
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Fish Food Factory run by KPA Unit 810.
					 Visiting the factory in March last year, he underscored the need to steadily put its modernization and cultured practice in production and life on a higher level. And he set forth the tasks for reinforcing modern equipment, putting all its production processes on an automated and stream-lined basis and turning its compound into a woodland and orchard and provided it with valuable equipment.
					
					 He took hands of the officials one by one and noted that he was very pleased to hear that the output at the factory has remarkably increased as it was furnished with modern equipment. And he gave a high appreciation of the unit, saying that it is ready to do all what the Party desired.
					
					 He went round food processing shop, fish sorting ground, fish freezing chamber, food storage and other places of the factory.
					
					 He noted that the factory made a lot of achievements in the work to establish the scientific and rational fish food production method while successfully introducing a combined control system for fish food production processes and streamlining the processing, package and carriage on a high level.
					
					 It is admirable that the factory has run a newly-built sci-tech room on a normal basis to improve the technical skills of its employees, he said.
					
					 The factory has an important role to play in implementing the Party's intention to supply fresh fish to servicepersons and civilians all the year round through further development of pisciculture, he said, advancing the tasks to be carried out by it.
					
					 He gave an instruction that officials, scientists and technicians of the relevant field should visit the factory and manufacture modern floating food production equipment for fish farms.
					
					 He is very pleased to see the factory full of modern equipment and its production potentials is great, he said, adding that if the factory keeps the production going at a high rate, enough quality fish food can be supplied to fish farms.
					
					 Noting that KPA Unit 810 has registered a lot of successes in the efforts to bring a radical turn in fish farming as intended by the Party, he said its secret lies in that the unit is displaying the spirit of unconditionally implementing the Party policy in hearty response to it. He gave strength and courage to the unit so that it can steadily play a vanguard role in the drive for developing the country's pisciculture.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, O Su Yong and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, on July 10.
					 The Algerian president in the message said he was pleased to extend warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on behalf of the people and government of Algeria and on his own behalf, wishing him success in his noble work for carrying out his duty.
					
					 He expressed his will to strive together with Kim Jong Un to consolidate the bilateral friendly relations in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., UAWK Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Moves for THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., UAWK Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Moves for THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) in a statement Sunday bitterly condemned the moves of the Park Geun Hye group for deploying THAAD to ruthlessly trample down the vital rights of the south Korean peasants and impose nuclear war disaster upon all Koreans as an unpardonable treacherous act.
					 The statement said:
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in Songju, life, security and livelihood of not only many people in its township amounting to more than half of the county population but also peasants in the area will be exposed to grave danger and its ensuing economic losses will be enormous.
					
					 The puppet group has dispatched those concerned of the Ministry of Defense one after another to Songju, claiming that THAAD doesn't affect human body and is for protecting "the people's security and life." But this is just sleight of hand of the group to calm down the angry public and mask its despicable colors as traitors.
					
					 The Park group unhesitatingly offered the county as a U.S. military base by introducing THAAD in the face of strong denunciation and rejection by the public at home and abroad. It is as clear as noonday that the group will make desperate efforts to prolong their remaining days through sycophancy toward the U.S. and treachery by providing it with the second and third Songju.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad, together with peasants of south Korea out in bold actions to defend the vital rights and get the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' bases dismantled, will wage a nationwide struggle to wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors.

articles.title: Nature Museum and Central Zoo Completed
articles.content:
Nature Museum and Central Zoo Completed
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo were successfully completed.
					 The Nature Museum covering more than 35 000 square meters is a modern mass educational and science research and dissemination base and leisure complex as it has the Space Hall, Paleozoic Era Hall, Mesozoic Era Hall, Cenozoic Era Hall, Animals Hall, Plants Hall, Gifts Hall, E-Library and Sci-tech Disseminating Room.
					
					 More than 40 animal sheds such as the Shed of Reptiles, Shed of Monkeys, Shed of Beasts, Shed of Elephants, Shed of Giraffes and Shed of Small Horses have been modernly built to match the surrounding scenery. Visitors can easily guess from distance what animals they house.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Kim Su Gil, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and officials and builders of the Korean People's Army units and public units who contributed to remodeling the zoo, officials and workers of institutions and industrial establishments and school youth and children in Pyongyang and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies here and military attaches and their wives, embassy officials and other foreign guests.
					
					 Premier of the DPRK Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, in his address said that the successful construction of the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo was the fruition of the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is devoting his all to the work for providing the people with the world-level base for cultural and leisure activities.
					
					 The inaugural tape was cut by representatives of builders in the army and public units, persons of merits, university students and secondary school students.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
Hyesan, July 24 (KCNA) -- The National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup closed with due ceremony in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province Sunday.
					 The Jagang Provincial Taekwon-Do Team (men) and the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team (women) took the first place in sparring matches held without weight distinction. The South Phyongan Provincial Team (men) and the Pyongyang City Team (women) won the group sparring matches. Players from the teams of Pyongyang City, North Hwanghae Province, Ryanggang Province, Nampho City and the Central Physical Training College took the first place in individual games.
					
					 In Paduk games players from teams of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee won individual games and teams of Pyongyang and South Hamgyong Province took the first place in men's and women's team games. The South Hamgyong Provincial Team also won mixed double games.

articles.title: Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Another remains of the DPRK heroes were recently buried at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery located at the foot of Mt. Sokbak in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The martyrs cemetery came into being thanks to the noble moral obligation and warm love of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to glorify through generations the heroic feats performed by soldiers of the Korean People's Army in the period of the Korean war (1950-1953). 
					
					 A monument to the teachings given by President Kim Il Sung stands in the cemetery.
					
					 Seen in the cemetery are the monument to the fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army, the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes", a monument to the poem dedicated to the fallen fighters and group sculptures.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un initiated the construction of the cemetery, personally selected its site and led work to complete it at the best level. 
					
					 On the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), an inaugural ceremony took pace in the presence of Kim Jong Un in July Juche 102 (2013). 
					
					 The cemetery serves as an educational centre to implant into the minds of all the servicepersons and people the indomitable revolutionary spirit and the spirit of devotedly defending the motherland displayed by martyrs during the war.  
					
					 Cemeteries of fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army were also built in every provincial seat.
					
					 With the approach of the war victory day (July 27), service personnel and people from all walks of life are visiting the cemeteries across the country to pay tribute to fallen fighters..

articles.title: Munsu Water Park Crowded with People
articles.content:
Munsu Water Park Crowded with People
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Water Park on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang is crowded with people nowadays.
					 This year alone, the number of visitors reached over 100 000. And thousands of people enjoy themselves at the park on a daily average with the months for maritime physical culture, July and August, as an occasion.
					
					 The park has open-air wading pools with various water slides and water tanks, indoor wading pool and gymnasium.
					
					 The park has also become one of tourist destinations.
					
					 Alexandr Torshyn, first vice-chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, said that the park is the best among those in other countries he visited, adding:
					
					 All in the park is for the people and top priority is given to their convenience and health. In the park I could feel the loving care of supreme leader Comrade Kim Jong Un for the people. Back home, I will recommend Russians to go to the Munsu Water Park when they visit the DPRK.
					
					 Jo Sung Hui, a teacher of the Janggyong Junior Secondary School in Sosong District, told KCNA that she would train all her students to be reliable maters of the maritime country.

articles.title: Illegal "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty"
articles.content:
Illegal "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty"
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists reduced Korea into their colony by most heinous and illegal means and had imposed innumerable misfortune, pain and calamity upon the Korean nation in the past. 
					 The crimes they committed against the Korean nation include the fabrication of "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty".
					
					 The Japanese imperialists faked the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" to deprive the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1932-1910) of its diplomatic right and enforced the resident-general rule over Korea. In order to hold Korea in political bondage, they hatched a plot to make Emperor Kojong, who had got anti-Japanese sentiment, step down from the throne.
					
					 Under the pretext of "guarding" the royal palace, the Japanese imperialists put a ban on the palace to keep the emperor in custody. In May 1907, they dissolved the former Cabinet and rigged up a pro-Japanese Cabinet to cut down the power of the emperor and enlarge the authority of the Cabinet.
					
					 Emperor Kojong tried to restore the national rights with the help of the world powers and thereby sent emissaries to the 2nd International Peace Conference held in Hague to make public the illegality and invalidity of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" and injustice of Japan's colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 Availing themselves of the emissary incident, the Japanese imperialists decided the "policy toward Korea" aiming at dethroning Kojong and seizing Korea's right of home administration and entrusted its implementation to Hirobumi Ito, the ringleader of aggression upon Korea.
					
					 When meeting Emperor Kojong, Hirobumi Ito pulled up the emperor over the dispatch of emissaries to Hague, branding it as a hostile act against Japan and violation of "agreement". And Ito instigated pro-Japanese stooges to forcibly dethrone Kojong and forced them to accept the already worked-out "draft treaty".
					
					 On July 24, 1907, the draft was submitted to and railroaded through the pro-Japanese Cabinet.
					
					 The "treaty" consisted of seven provisions pointed out that the Japanese "resident-general" will superintend the Feudal Joson Dynasty in its "improvement of administrative policy", important administrative measures like enactment should be approved by the "resident-general", high-ranking officials could not be appointed or dismissed without permission of the "resident-general" and any Japanese recommended by the "resident-general" should be appointed as a government official.
					
					 As seen above, the "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty" is an illegal and invalid "document" unilaterally fabricated and coercively concluded by means of tricks and plots from every point of view.

articles.title: New Sanctions on North Korea: An Act of War by Any Measure
articles.content:
New Sanctions on North Korea: An Act of War by Any Measure
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Posted on the Global Research, Ca was an article titled "New Sanctions on North Korea: An Act of War by Any Measure" on July 16.
					 The Korean people suffered the worst difficulties due to the vicious moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces for stifling the DPRK at the end of the last century, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK has experienced substantial economic growth in the last few years.
					
					 The announcement by the U.S. officials of new sanctions on the DPRK was described as a "declaration of war" by the DPRK. This is not some wild, extreme claim or accusation.
					
					 The DPRK is trying to repair its economy from the disaster of the 1990s.
					
					 U.S. leaders are economically strangling the DPRK, and say they are doing it because of concerns about "human rights".
					
					 The U.S. sells weapons and props up the economies of brutal absolute monarchies where even basic notions of human rights do not exist, while continuing to threaten the DPRK.
					
					 The government in the northern part of the Korean peninsula has a constitution and voting, while providing universal housing to the population. These facts alone put the DPRK miles ahead of other countries in terms of human rights.
					
					 The harsh response of the DPRK to the new sanctions should not be shocking to anyone.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Factors in War Victory and Its Significance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Factors in War Victory and Its Significance
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung was the decisive factor of the Korean people's victory in the past Fatherland Liberation War, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Thanks to his Juche-based military idea, preeminent strategies and tactics and outstanding commanding art, all the operational plans worked out by the "famous generals" and "illustrious commanders" in the capitalist world during the Korean war with all their wisdoms and talents went bust. And the DPRK was well known as the country of heroes and miracles.
					
					 The victory won by heroic Korea in the war proved truth before the times and history that no force on earth could conquer the service personnel and civilians all out in the war under the guidance of a great leader, confident of the justice of their cause and their strength.
					
					 The victory in the war marked an epoch-making event as it averted a new world war and helped prevent a nuclear disaster and ushered in a new period of upsurge in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and national liberation struggle and brought about a turning point in the struggle for accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The victory won by heroic Korea, exciting the world people in the 20th century and going down to human history, is shining more brilliantly thanks to the great succession.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il performed such undying feats as bringing to their knees the imperialist allied forces coming in attack in swarms by dint of Songun politics in the decades-long war without gunfire. His undying feats are shedding more resplendent rays thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime's Desperate Efforts for Cooperation in Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime's Desperate Efforts for Cooperation in Anti-DPRK Campaign
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Mandarins of the puppet Foreign Ministry of south Korea recently held a vice-ministerial meeting with their U.S. and Japanese masters in Hawaii. They agreed with their masters to boost "cooperation in ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the north" and "building a missile shield," blustering "the north should not be allowed to develop nukes and missiles."
					 At a meeting with the Japanese diplomatic chief held earlier the south Korean puppet forces were closeted over the issue of sustaining "international sanctions and pressure on the north," making such stereotyped remarks as "provocations" and "threats."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says: 
					
					 What they uttered is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the confrontation maniacs to block the advance of the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group, now hit hard at home and abroad, recklessly talked nonsense about "nuclear threat from the north" and "cooperation in missile defence" at confabs with their U.S. and Japanese masters in a bid to escape criticism and denunciation of the group.
					
					 By doing so, the Park group sought to calm down the angry public at home and abroad and justify the deployment of THAAD and realize the ambition for invading the north, backed by the U.S. and Japanese masters.
					
					 This mean diplomacy, however, only disclosed once again the servile and despicable nature of the Park Geun Hye group as wicked sycophants working with bloodshot eyes to boost cooperation with outside forces in the anti-DPRK campaign, going against the trend of the times for dialogue and peace, and war servants of the U.S. and Japanese masters.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should behave themselves, bearing in mind that escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in collusion with outsiders is as foolish as precipitating their destruction.

articles.title: Action against THAAD Deployment Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action against THAAD Deployment Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the South Jolla Provincial Measure Council against THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference outside the South Jolla Provincial Office on July 21, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers said the south Korean and U.S. authorities admitted that THAAD is not of substantial interests to security.
					
					 There is no proper site for THAAD deployment not only in Songju but in other parts of south Korea and, in fact no land at all for it, they noted.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop at once the farce not helpful to the people's security.

articles.title: Patriot Missile Battery of U.S. Forces in Japan Deployed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Patriot Missile Battery of U.S. Forces in Japan Deployed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. deployed a Patriot 3 missile battery in Kunsan, North Jolla Province, south Korea on July 13 via Pusan Port under the pretext of a military drill, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that it is the first time that the missile unit was deployed in south Korea via sea.
					
					 The missile unit is now conducting a drill of intercepting the DPRK's missiles in coordinated operation with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea and the puppet forces. 
					
					 That the U.S. is training even the south Korean puppet army with the missiles it introduced into south Korea proves that the military nexus among the U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet regime has reached all the more reckless stage with an aim at fighting a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Protest Actions against THAAD Deployment Mount in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Actions against THAAD Deployment Mount in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Checking THAAD Deployment involving inhabitants of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea launched a protest action in Seoul on July 21 denouncing the authorities' moves to deploy THAAD.
					More than 2,000 members of the committee held a protest rally at Seoul Railway Station plaza with signs symbolizing peace attached to their chests.
					
					 The speakers said they held the rally in Seoul to let towering anger of Songju inhabitants demanding withdrawal of the decision on THAAD deployment be known.
					
					 They denounced the unilateral decision of the "government" disregarding the inhabitants.
					
					 They demanded media persons write articles after seeing for themselves the reason why the inhabitants turned out in the protest action.
					
					 At the end of the rally dozens of people including the county chief had their hair shaven.
					
					 The participants launched a demonstration against the regime's unilateral decision on THAAD deployment and handed over a letter of protest to Chongwadae, the "Saenuri Party" and the U.S. Embassy in Seoul.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Feats Lauded by Russian Internet News
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats Lauded by Russian Internet News
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet news Primorski Reporzor posted special news on July 20 on the 4th anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 It was illustrated with his photo. 
					
					 It said:
					
					 The title of the DPRK Marshal conferred upon Comrade Kim Jong Un on July 17, 2012 reflects the boundless respect of the Korean people attracted by his brilliant ideological and theoretical wisdom, outstanding leadership and popular traits.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary ideology of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and laid down the far-sighted strategy for the Korean revolution to advance straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism and set forth the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 In the Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee Kim Jong Un indicated the strategic line and tasks for ushering in a great heyday of socialist construction and the orientation of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a powerful socialist country under the guidance of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Observed by Pakistani Newspaper
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Observed by Pakistani Newspaper
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani newspaper Election Times carried an article titled "July 27 of DPRK" on July 19 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The newspaper said:
					
					 July 27 is a significant day for the DPRK.
					
					 The day in 1953, 63 years ago, the U.S. was brought to their knees before the Korean people though it boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 On June 25, 1950 the U.S. ignited the Korean war in a bid to realize its ambition for world hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. hurled its troops and forces of its 15 satellite countries, the south Korean army and the remnants of the old Japanese army, more than two million in all.
					
					 But an event to be specially recorded in human history of wars took place in this war.
					
					 The U.S. was defeated in the war for the first time though it did not suffer even a single defeat in more than 110 wars of aggression since its foundation.
					
					 On July 27, the U.S., in the long run, was forced to sign the Armistice Agreement which is little different from a surrender document.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Condemn S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crimes
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Condemn S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crimes
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 16 in support of the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies.
					 Recalling that the spokesman gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that Amnesty International recently demanded the south Korean puppet regime open to public the fate of women citizens of the DPRK who were allured and abducted to south Korea, the statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have taken women abductees hostage and disallowed even their contact with media. And they also disallowed their parents to meet with their daughters in Seoul.
					
					 This is a hideous human rights abuse and unethical crime.
					
					 The demand of Amnesty International proves that the south Korean authorities' behavior is becoming the target of the international community's serious concern and accusation.
					
					 It is nonsensical and shameless for the south Korean authorities to talk about any "protection" while keeping DPRK women in custody.
					
					 The UN, the UN Human Rights Council and other international human rights organizations should bring the south Korean authorities and gangsters of the Intelligence Service to justice and punish them for the above-said crime.

articles.title: U.S., Worst Human Rights Abuser; Nigerian Body
articles.content:
U.S., Worst Human Rights Abuser; Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "U.S. heinous human rights abuses" on its website on July 18.
					 Citing facts to expose the heinous human rights abuses such as racial discrimination occurring in the U.S. every day, the article said:
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the worst human rights abuser and the worst tundra of human rights in the world where all human rights abuses are rampant.
					
					 The U.S., however, is mocking the international community while styling itself "human rights judge."
					
					 The U.S. shamelessness and cruelty are clearly manifested in its "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Upset by the daily mounting international prestige of the DPRK, the U.S. is persistently resorting to military threat and blackmail and heinous "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Recently it perpetrated such reckless act as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK under the pretext of the "human rights issue."
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to break the single-minded unity of the DPRK and bring down its "social system" but it is no more than a foolish dream.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to settle its own human right abuses before talking about someone's human rights issue under the deceptive pretext of "championing human rights."
					
					 The international community should bring the U.S. to justice, to begin with.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Praise Kim Il Sung's Exploits
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Praise Kim Il Sung's Exploits
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried special write-ups accompanied with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The Russian paper Uralski Rabochi on July 7 in an article said that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of mankind as the outstanding leader in the 20th century.
					
					 The Lao papers Congtap Pasason Lao and Vatelao on July 6 and 7 cited detailed facts to prove that he showed an example of internationalism.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age on July 8 dedicated one whole page to the article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun."
					
					 The July issue of the Bulgarian paper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo detailed the feats he performed by liberating the country, leading the war to victory and building the party, state and army in the one whole page article titled "22nd anniversary of demise of Comrade Kim Il Sung, founder and leader of the DPRK."
					
					 The Venezuelan paper Vea on July 7 dedicated one whole page to an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and global independence" and subtitled "Development of non-aligned movement was one of exploits HE Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, performed for global independence" and "President Kim Il Sung devoted himself to strengthening global socialism."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Piensos de Peces, adscrita a unidad 810 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Piensos de Peces, adscrita a unidad 810 del EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Piensos de Peces, adscrita a la unidad 810 del EPC.
					Durante su anterior visita a la fabrica en marzo del ano pasado, el presento las tareas de modernizarla y establecer en ella en el nivel mas alto la cultura de produccion y vida, instalar mas equipos modernos, automatizar y encadenar todos los procesos de produccion y reforestar bien el recinto de la fabrica como bosque y huerto. Ademas ha enviado a la fabrica los equipos modernos preparados personalmente.
					
					Apretando las manos con cada uno de los funcionarios de la fabrica, Kim Jong Un dijo que se habia puesto muy contento cuando escucho el parte de que se incremento notablemente la produccion gracias a la instalacion de equipos modernos. Prosiguio que la unidad 810 del EPC cumple sin falta cualquier cosa que desee el Partido.
					
					El Comandante Supremo paso revista a varios puntos de la fabrica como taller de procesamiento de piensos, area de seleccion de pescados, sala de refrigeracion de pescados y el almacen de piensos.
					
					Senalo que la fabrica logro muchos exitos en establecer los metodos cientificos y racionales para la produccion de piensos de peces como disponer el sistema de control integral de los procesos de produccion y encadenar en alto nivel los procesos de elaboracion, embalaje y transporte.
					
					Evaluo de bueno el hecho de que opera normalmente la sala de divulgacion cientifico-tecnica, acondicionada nuevamente para mejorar la calificacion tecnica de los empleados.
					
					Presento las tareas que competen a la fabrica, diciendo que ella asume una mision importante en cumplir el proposito del Partido de desarrollar mas la piscicultura para suministrar a los militares y habitantes los pescados frescos en todas las estaciones del ano.
					
					Dio a los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama interesada la indicacion de recorrer esta base de produccion, fabricar modernos equipos de produccion de piensos dilatados y flotables y enviarlos a los criaderos de peces.
					
					El recorrido por esta fabrica me pone de buen humor, dijo y califico de muy grande la potencialidad productiva de la fabrica llena de equipos modernos. Agrego que si ella normaliza la produccion en alto nivel, podra suministrar en lo suficiente los piensos de buena calidad a los criaderos de peces.
					
					La unidad 810 del EPC logra muchos exitos en la campana para registrar innovaciones mas grandes en la piscicultura acorde al proposito del partido, apunto y anadio que la clave esta en trabajar con el espiritu de cumplir incondicionalmente las politicas del partido tras aceptarlas con el corazon. Dio alientos a la unidad para que continue siendo vanguardia en desarrollar la piscicultura del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, O Su Yong y Jo Yong Won.
